SummaryRecord.dc:title: Image2000 Product 1 (at1) Multispectral
SummaryRecord.dc:subject: imagery
baseMaps
earthCover
SummaryRecord.dct:abstract: IMAGE2000 product 1 individual orthorectified scenes. IMAGE2000 was produced from ETM+ Landsat 7 satellite data and provides a consistent European coverage of individual orthorectified scenes in national map projection systems.
